value: Cooper Union Museum Lace Study Card

label: Description
value: Venetian point in low relief with various needlemade stitches and picots. Design of scrolling stem with leaves and flowers.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Mrs. George Nichols from the collection of her mother, Mrs. J.P. Morgan

label: Description
value: Mechlin lace with diagonally placed bands of openwork with flowering sprays. Seam at center shows that two pieces have been joined to form one strip with rounded ends.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: bobbin lace, Mechlin style

label: Provenance
value: Given by Mrs. George Nichols from the collection of her Mother, Mrs. J.P.Morgan (1868-1925)
